19
20#include <config.h>
21
22/* Specification. */
23#include "error-progname.h"
24
25#include <stdio.h>
26
27#include "progname.h"
28
29
30/* Indicates whether errors and warnings get prefixed with program_name.
31 Default is true. */
32bool error_with_progname = true;
33
34/* Print program_name prefix on stderr if and only if error_with_progname
35 is true. */
36void
37maybe_print_progname ()
38{
39 if (error_with_progname)
40 fprintf (stderr, "%s: ", program_name);
41}
42
